timeline.message: NIFI-8060 Added minimal VolatileProvenanceRepository to nifi-stateless-engine and remove dependency on nifi-volatile-provenance-repo module

timeline.bodyText: Given the usage pattern, that this will only be used in stateless, and it's not loaded via the service loader, I don't think we even need the no-arg constructor.
timeline.author: markap14

timeline.bodyText: I think we can just make this a no-op and remove the initialized - doesn't appear to serve any particular function?
timeline.author: markap14

timeline.bodyText: Don't think we need to actually call this, given that isAuthorized will always return true
timeline.author: markap14

timeline.bodyText: I think we can avoid even calling authorize, no?
timeline.author: markap14

timeline.bodyText: It might make sense to call this StatelessProvenanceRepository or perhaps RingBufferProvenanceRepository just to avoid confusion with the existing VolatileProvenanceRepository?
timeline.author: markap14

timeline.bodyText: Can we change this whole method to simply return getEvent(id); now?
timeline.author: markap14
